review.title: “Good and valuable experience”
review.pros: Pros – Hands on understanding, Good exposure and training, Good Products. Technical abilities, Have visionary attitude, Focused approach.
review.cons: Cons – Soft on employees, sustanability, Ability to fulfill orders in time and hence have a backlog
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Timely order executions, take steps to enhance ROI on sales team, convert superb understanding to numbers,

review.title: “A worse company to work with!”
review.pros: Pros – Have a good product mix (with worse management) , director has a cohesive vision.
review.cons: Cons – Doesn't put any emphasis on training, established in 1998 but still behaves like a stat-up, worse part is salary and treatment to their ex-employees, salaries are paid late and company has no commission policy
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management should look up-to their employees, their growth and their satisfaction.
